channel.title: Web on Reside-IC
channel.description: Recent content in Web on Reside-IC

item.title: RESIDE-IC Web Applications
item.description: Introduction This page describes some aspects to think about when considering a new RESIDE web application to present research: why a research team might want a web application whether a Shiny app or full web application would better meet their needs the components of a full research web application what we require from research in order to build an interface to it which a new web application can use some different patterns of application we can provide Why have a web application?
